# Python para todo

Ejemplos de uso de Python para solucionar distintos problemas:

## Ejemplo 1

Pyodide-enabled code cell, using `{pyodide-python}`: This allows for completely executable code - the user can modify the code and execute it!

Direct code:
```{pyodide-python}
mi_nombre = "Francisco"
print(f'Hola {mi_nombre}!')
```

## Ejemplo 2

Pyodide-enabled code cell, using `{pyodide-python}`: This allows for completely executable code - the user can modify the code and execute it!

Direct code:
```{pyodide-python}
mi_nombre = "Francisco"
n = 2
print(f'Hola {mi_nombre*n}!')
```
